text: Mario Luis Kreutzberger Blumenfeld (born December 28, 1940) is a Chilean television producer and television personality who is known for being the host of SÃ¡bado Gigante and Don Francisco Presenta. Don Francisco was born on December 28, 1940 in Talca, Chile to German-Jewish parents. He studied in New York City. Don Francisco is still married to Teresa "Temmy" Muchnik Rosenblum. He now lives in Miami, Florida. ==References== ==Other websites== * Univision homepage * Canal 13 - Chilean TV Network * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean television presenters Category:Jewish entertainers Category:People from Talca Category:South American Jews Category:Television personalities Category:Television producers
title: Don Francisco
